title: I hate the adc role
body: Idek every time I'm "forced" into it I pretty much flamed to death. Usually I end up with a non-meta support(which is actually totally fine with me really), but they end up taking lots of cs, never buying wards, flaming me for not having enough damage, and just being rude. And the thing is I fill positions, so if you wanted to do all that why not take adc yourself and let me support instead really :S
